## LimitedRowSelectorComponent class

Component used for handling row selection with limit to count of selected rows

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class LimitedRowSelectorComponent<TSelectedData = any, TData = any, TId = any> extends BasicRowSelectorComponent<TSelectedData, TData, TId> implements LimitedRowSelector<TSelectedData, TData, TId>, GridPluginGeneric<LimitedRowSelectorOptions<TSelectedData, TData, TId>>, OnDestroy 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [\_options](./grid.limitedrowselectorcomponent._options.md) |  | <code>LimitedRowSelectorOptions&lt;TSelectedData, TData, TId&gt;</code> | Options for grid plugin |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [selectItem(item, select)](./grid.limitedrowselectorcomponent.selectitem.md) |  | Adds item to selection (or remove it from selection if deselect is true) |
